text: 13.4: Ro 6.4; Fi 2.7-8; 1 Pi 3.18Guigira, ana fhum ŋkasŋka ki fhuv, mbe ana ndi khanarareŋ ga tɨga fugim, ana rimgi. Ntigem, Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋkar ana taagia khavgiap, zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigap ki. Gu ana phorgap, gu vhɨra ŋkasŋkar ki fhu. Gu Fhe Bakɨmen ŋkasŋkan panan, Krais phorgɨ kɨv nden ŋgarɨrga.
